tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE experiments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  researcher_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_researcher FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
  experiment_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE data_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  data_value TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_description TEXT,
    started_at TIMESTAMP,
    ended_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    measurement_name VARCHAR(255),
    value FLOAT,
    sample_id INT REFERENCES samples(id),
    researcher_id INT REFERENCES researchers(id)
);
